channel.title: How can i send messages ingame without being logged in?
channel.description:
How can i send messages ( like announcments, And kicking peopl ) without being logged in.. like throught my runserver[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 19, 2008, 01:34:40 pm[/size][hr]can anyone help plz?
and is there even a way to do that?
